page.title: 16THE MINERS' STRIKE
page.content: At Christmas the Action group held a party for the miners' children.Every child up to the age of 11 got a present.Children over 11 received Â£5 and a selection box.We played several games. After Christmas more men went back to work.Eventually so many went back because they had no money that the strike ended.Now all the men are working hard trying to save their jobs and pay off all their bills which they could not afford during the strike. Lots of people were injured,some even died.There was a lot of trouble between the police and the miners but now that is getting back to normal. A lot of families are trying to forget what the strike did to them and their children.
